title: Real-Time User Analytics Dashboard with Behavioral Intelligence
description: Advanced analytics platform providing comprehensive user engagement insights, behavioral patterns, and predictive metrics to drive strategic product decisions and optimize user experience across all touchpoints
iWant: to access real-time user analytics with behavioral intelligence, cohort analysis, and predictive insights through an interactive dashboard
soThat: I can identify user engagement trends, optimize feature adoption, reduce churn, and make data-driven strategic decisions that improve user satisfaction and business outcomes
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays real-time user metrics with sub-second refresh including active users, session duration, and feature engagement rates across web and mobile platforms
Behavioral intelligence module provides user journey mapping, conversion funnel analysis, and identifies drop-off points with actionable recommendations
Cohort retention analysis supports configurable time periods (daily, weekly, monthly) with predictive churn modeling and risk scoring for user segments
Advanced export capabilities include scheduled reports, custom date ranges, multiple formats (CSV, PDF, Excel), and automated email delivery to stakeholders
